description: Sticky fingers are inevitable with this veggie-packed dinner. Pork spare ribs match with a gingery rice, packed with peas, corn, capsicum, edamame and coriander.
name: Sticky Sesame Pork Rashers With Vegetable Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pork, kecap manis, chilli sauce, oil, garlic and ginger in a large shallow glass dish. Cover. Refrigerate for 4 hours to marinate.
Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Grill pork for 7 minutes each side or until sticky and cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes.

Heat rice according to packet instructions. Combine rice, corn, peas, capsicum, spring onion, dressing and half the coriander in a serving bowl. Top with shallots, edamame, sesame seeds and remaining coriander. Serve salad with ribs.
